text: Martin Leonard Brill is a retired fencer from New Zealand. Martin competed at the 1984 and 1988 Summer Olympics. He was born on April 7, 1956.Martin Brill == References == Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Olympians for New Zealand Category:Fencers Category:Sportspeople from Staffordshire Category:People from Stoke-on-Trent
title: Martin Brill
